TextBlock.Text: DAZ: These new storm shelters are incredible, Thatch! Since they were installed, I have felt much safer during my stay on this stormy planet.
THATCH: I feel the same way, Daz! We owe Kousa at the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> much gratitude for engineering this incredible invention to keep us safe.
DAZ: Hm..? Why has the storm shelter has suddenly activated? There does not appear to be any cyclones are near the island at the moment.
DAZ: How strange.. The storm shelters should only activate in the presence of cyclones, should they not? Could this storm shelter be defective?
THATCH: No, the issue does not seem unique to this unit alone.. The other storm shelters seem to be simultaneously experiencing the same issue.

THATCH: Shamefully, I do not know much about storm shelters.. It was not long ago we Nomai on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> were completely insulated from cyclones in the <color=orange>Looming City,</color> you see.
THATCH: When I next travel home, I shall pay a visit to the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow's</color> equator to shed some light on this issue!
